definition: surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
Mato Grosso, western province of Brazil

sentences.english: And then Grosso's goal in the 119th minute.
sentences.chinese: 結果格羅索在119分鐘進球了。

sentences.english: The sun sets behind a parched tree in Mato Grosso, midwestern Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 巴西中西部的馬託格羅索州，被烤乾的樹後的夕陽。

sentences.english: Mato Grosso do Sul region in Brazil (and especially the quiet town of Bonito) boasts many marvelous underground lakes: Gruta do Lago Azul, Gruta do Mimoso, Aquário Natural.
sentences.chinese: 巴西馬託格羅索地區擁有很多神奇的地下湖泊。

sentences.english: A vaquero on a cattle ranch in Mato Grosso.
sentences.chinese: 馬託格羅索州一間牛場的牧童。

sentences.english: A vaquero cattle ranch in Mato Grosso.
sentences.chinese: 馬託格羅索州一間牛場的牧童。

sentences.english: "We were forced out of our hostel because of the World Cup, " Rossouw said.
sentences.chinese: “因爲世界盃我們流離失所，”羅索烏說。
